attributes.additional_details: That a minority party of 313 Conservative MPs should not be allowed to select the next Prime Minister.This is a particularly difficult time in UK history - with an almost 50/50 split between Brexiters and Remainers, and the strengthening rise in demand for independence for Scotland.
attributes.background: The present Government are the cause of the difficulties and have exacerbated the problem through personal political ambitions, rather than their duty the country.
